name: Sink
descriptions: The Sink is an artificial personality residing in the Sink in Big MT in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.

Like other systems in the Sink, the computerized Sink was given a personality module by Dr. Mobius but was disabled around the time he left the Think Tank for the Forbidden Zone when Dr. Klein hurled all the modules off the balcony. The Sink's module ended up inside the magnetohydraulics complex, where it can potentially be recovered by the Courier in 2281.
As according to its role, the Sink was programmed to want to provide clean drinking water and help clean any matter placed in it.
The Sink appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.
Travis Stout wrote the Sink, in addition to all the other artificial personalities in Old World Blues.

topics.response_text: You're back! And the brains didn't lobotomize you! Well, not any worse, at least. Hooray!

topics.topic_text: You seem kind of worried about dirt. What's wrong?
topics.response_text: Ugh, it's just so... unsanitary! Do you know how many germs are in one cubic centimeter of dirt?{Hysterical}Seventy... hundred... gajillion!

topics.topic_text: I'd just like a drink, thanks.
topics.response_text: You can have as much as you like! Just, eh... please don't put your lips on the faucet? It's so unsanitary.

topics.topic_text: I just came over to fill some of these empty bottles.
topics.response_text: {Apologetic}Oh, I'd love to, darling, but the circuits that allow me to dispense water into non-organic containers burned out years ago.

topics.topic_text: I'm okay. Talk to you later.
topics.response_text: Come back any time you want a drink. Or to get...{queasy}clean.
{Narration}The Sink continued to ruthlessly scrub any particulate matter that came near it.

{Narration}{Magnetohydraulics Plant discovered}Eventually, it gained access to the{Mag-neat-o-Hydraulics}Magnetohydraulics Plant and nearly flooded all the Big Empty in an attempt to scrub the crater clean.
{Narration}{Innovative Toxins Plant discovered}Once it learned of the Innovative Toxins Plant, however, it gained new purpose.
